ComicInfo.Summary:
Get the 7th and FINAL issue of the NSFW zom-com series where flawed male fantasy becomes a nightmare!
Last chapter, Ace found that his friend Gwen had finally succumbed to the lesbian zombie disease. When shooting her wasn't enough, he was forced to to accept his greatest shame as his greatest strength. In order to save Gwen and the rest of the town, Ace now will use it in the final showdown against the alien Space Queen who started it all. Will he be a hero, or will he lose his dick like all the others before him?
22 pages of full-color nudity and violence make this an ADULTS ONLY horror comic.
Sometimes when hot girls make out: IT'S EVIL!
